definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
cast and crew/performers and production team

to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter

sentences.english: Fuxin Mongolian drama has a unique form of expression and the cultural charm.
sentences.chinese: 阜新蒙古剧有着独特的表现形式和文化魅力。

sentences.english: The play went on until the candles went out.
IAE:What was your first paid acting gig?
sentences.chinese: 第一次参演的是哪部剧？

sentences.english: They are both really just funny shows.
This realistic melodrama about urban people's emotional life became an instant hot topic among the audience.
sentences.chinese: 这部现实题材的都市情感剧一播出就引发观众的热议。

sentences.english: IT IS the strangest of courtroom dramas.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部最为怪诞的法庭剧。

sentences.english: So it's always that classic match-up of just like opposites, but it's great to watch and everything.
sentences.chinese: 所以这又是一个经典的两极绝配，很好看的一部剧。

sentences.english: "Yixing Qiaozhuang" drama be closely linked with gander culture.
sentences.chinese: “易性乔装”剧和我国的性别文化息息相关。

sentences.english: The play has no box-office appeal.
I can recommend this play to all lovers of good theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我把这个剧推荐给所有爱好优秀戏剧的人。

sentences.english: The traditional melodrama of the wicked squire and rustic tenant.
sentences.chinese: 关于邪恶乡绅和土气佃农的传统传奇剧。

sentences.english: Teochew opera is also very famous and has a unique form.
sentences.chinese: 潮州剧由于有其独特的表演形式，也是闻名与世。

sentences.english: They were plays that people performed, That Shakespeare himself probably changed.
sentences.chinese: 它们是人演的剧，莎士比亚他自己可能也会变。

sentences.english: Spiritual drama – or tendentious piece of Catholic proselytising?
sentences.chinese: 励志剧，或是宣传天主教的宗教片？

sentences.english: The"charm"is the widely known cause for Guan Hanqing s Gongan dramas.
sentences.chinese: “魅力”是关汉卿公案剧盛传不衰的主要原因。

sentences.english: The Diamondback Grille is a  story of a fictitious international restaurant business that decides to come to China.
sentences.chinese: 响尾蛇烧烤店是一个故事剧。

definition: idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
